title: Bug 26079Use PfLoadMetrics() to speed up text extenting.
description: Bug 26079Use PfLoadMetrics() to speed up text extenting.
OB: If you use PfLoadMetrics() when using PfExtentWideText() (which we are alreadydoing) then you can avoid all transactions to the external font server.Thisprovides a big drop in CPU usage when using Tables, Trees, and the StyledTexteditor.
